content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":212052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら、待たぬかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait up!\""},{"lineNumber":212053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあはあ、あ、焦った……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff, huff, ah, that was close...\""},{"lineNumber":212054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、この馬鹿！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot!\""},{"lineNumber":212055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なに意味の分からないことしてんだよ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What nonsense are you doing!?\""},{"lineNumber":212056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……仕方ないだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff... it can't be helped...\""},{"lineNumber":212057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また、一時間後に来てみましょうだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's try coming back again in an hour...\""},{"lineNumber":212058,"originalJapaneseLine":"一時間後――","translatedEnglishLine":"One hour later――"},{"lineNumber":212059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すんませーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-sorry to bother you...\""},{"lineNumber":212060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":212061,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルは入ってきたあなた達を見て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel looked at you as you entered,"},{"lineNumber":212062,"originalJapaneseLine":"眉を怒らせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and furrowed her brows angrily."},{"lineNumber":212063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また……貴様らか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You again... you lot...\""},{"lineNumber":212064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...\""},{"lineNumber":212065,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルがあなたをジロリと睨む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel glared sharply at you."},{"lineNumber":212066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父親も母親も、お前ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Neither your father nor your mother was as foolish as you.\""},{"lineNumber":212067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　トンチキではなかったぞ？","translatedEnglishLine":"They weren't such idiots, you know?"},{"lineNumber":212068,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いったいどんな教育を受けた","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of education did you receive?"},{"lineNumber":212069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、申し訳ありません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I am sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":212070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その点は謝罪をさせて頂きますだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please allow me to apologize for that...\""},{"lineNumber":212071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですから、その……せめて話だけでも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, um... at least let me talk with you...\""},{"lineNumber":212072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff...\""},{"lineNumber":212073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今後妾の周りをウロウロされても敵わん。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't stand having you loitering around me anymore."},{"lineNumber":212074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　話だけなら聞いてやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll listen to what you have to say."},{"lineNumber":212075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「感謝し、そして敬意を持って接せよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be grateful, and show respect."},{"lineNumber":212076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, sir!\""},{"lineNumber":212077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特にお前じゃぞ！　お前に言うておるからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially you! I'm talking to you!\""},{"lineNumber":212078,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは頷いておいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You nodded in response."},{"lineNumber":212079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff...\""},{"lineNumber":212080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットの兄弟とあっては無下にも出来んからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since you are Reset's brother, I can't just dismiss you."},{"lineNumber":212081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then...\""},{"lineNumber":212082,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルが椅子の背もたれに背を預け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel leaned back against the chair's backrest,"},{"lineNumber":212083,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きい溜め息を吐き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and let out a big sigh."},{"lineNumber":212084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで？　話とはなんじゃ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So? What is this talk about?\""},{"lineNumber":212085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずはこちらの紹介状を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, please take a look at this letter of introduction.\""},{"lineNumber":212086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうぞご覧下さいだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here you go.\""},{"lineNumber":212087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":212088,"originalJapaneseLine":"言われた通り、","translatedEnglishLine":"As instructed,"},{"lineNumber":212089,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの書いた紹介状に","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel read through the letter of introduction written by Kurukuu."},{"lineNumber":212090,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルが目を通す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel perused it carefully."},{"lineNumber":212091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、魔王討伐の為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, you are traveling for the purpose of defeating the Demon Lord...\""},{"lineNumber":212092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴様らは旅をしておると……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And you are on this journey...\""},{"lineNumber":212093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、その為に協力を……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And that you seek cooperation for that...\""},{"lineNumber":212094,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に魔王の子の協力を求める、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially, you seek the cooperation of the Demon Lord's child.\""},{"lineNumber":212095,"originalJapaneseLine":"紹介状を机に置き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Putting the letter of introduction down on the desk,"},{"lineNumber":212096,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルがあなた達に向き直る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel turned to face you all."},{"lineNumber":212097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「用件は理解した。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand your request."},{"lineNumber":212098,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その返答じゃが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But my answer is...\""},{"lineNumber":212099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I refuse.\""},{"lineNumber":212100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what!\""},{"lineNumber":212101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、待ってくださいよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, please!\""},{"lineNumber":212102,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そりゃあいったいどういう了見っすか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you mean by that!?\""},{"lineNumber":212103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当然であろうが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course it is!\""},{"lineNumber":212104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセットは今やこの国に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset is now an indispensable diplomat in this country,"},{"lineNumber":212105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なくてはならぬ外交官であり、","translatedEnglishLine":" a diplomat that this country cannot do without,"},{"lineNumber":212106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次期カラーの女王でもある」","translatedEnglishLine":"and also the next queen of Karaoke.\""},{"lineNumber":212107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな者を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone like that,"},{"lineNumber":212108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの魔王を討伐する旅に連れてく？」","translatedEnglishLine":"you want to take on a journey to defeat that Demon Lord?\""},{"lineNumber":212109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女王として、ここの都市長として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As queen, as the mayor of this city,"},{"lineNumber":212110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてリセットの母として……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and as Reset's mother...\""},{"lineNumber":212111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのような危険なことを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Doing something so dangerous...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに意味の分からないことしてんだよ！？
また、一時間後に来てみましょうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's try coming back again in an hour..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルは入ってきたあなた達を見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel looked at you as you entered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルがあなたをジロリと睨む。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Neither your father nor your mother was as foolish as you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トンチキではなかったぞ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They weren't such idiots, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったいどんな教育を受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of education did you receive?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その点は謝罪をさせて頂きますだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please allow me to apologize for that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですから、その……せめて話だけでも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, um... at least let me talk with you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後妾の周りをウロウロされても敵わん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't stand having you loitering around me anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話だけなら聞いてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll listen to what you have to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「感謝し、そして敬意を持って接せよ」
「特にお前じゃぞ！　お前に言うておるからな！」
あなたは頷いておいた。
リセットの兄弟とあっては無下にも出来んからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you are Reset's brother, I can't just dismiss you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルが椅子の背もたれに背を預け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel leaned back against the chair's backrest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きい溜め息を吐き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and let out a big sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで？　話とはなんじゃ？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, please take a look at this letter of introduction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの書いた紹介状に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel read through the letter of introduction written by Kurukuu.
"I see, you are traveling for the purpose of defeating the Demon Lord..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様らは旅をしておると……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And that you seek cooperation for that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に魔王の子の協力を求める、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Especially, you seek the cooperation of the Demon Lord's child."
Putting the letter of introduction down on the desk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルがあなた達に向き直る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel turned to face you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃあいったいどういう了見っすか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean by that!?"
"Reset is now an indispensable diplomat in this country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なくてはならぬ外交官であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a diplomat that this country cannot do without,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次期カラーの女王でもある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also the next queen of Karaoke."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔王を討伐する旅に連れてく？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you want to take on a journey to defeat that Demon Lord?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女王として、ここの都市長として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As queen, as the mayor of this city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてリセットの母として……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
